name: Mini Vintage Chorus
details:
Mini Format Vintage ChorusDirectly modeled after the original late 70's "Ensemble" chorus that started it all, the Mini Vintage Chorus delivers old-school BBD-style chorusing and true pitch-vibrato in a super tiny package.
Three simple controls and daisy-chain friendly "industry standard" 9VDC power let you slip glistening, watery chorus and warbly pitch-vibrato into the tightest of pedal-boards!
Handmade and built to last by real live humans, right here in Portland, Oregon using only premium parts for superior tone and years of dependable service.
Controls:
Mix (Effect wet/dry, CCW = 100% dry, CW = 100% wet)
Width (Oscillator width)
Rate (Oscillator speed)
Tech Specs:
True-Bypass
Input Impedance: ~500KΩ
Output Impedance: ~2KΩ
https://www.mrblackpedals.com/collections/mini-pedals/products/mini-vintage-chorus
